website_summaries.verdict: We give this larger sandwich maker the thumbs up for people who want to make more than just sandwiches.
pros: Stainless steel design with large, smooth grilling plates make perfect sandwiches, meats, vegetables, and other items
Adjustable temperature settings for precise cooking
cons: It is somewhat bulky and difficult to store

website_summaries.verdict: A unique nonstick sandwich press that can also make grilled omelets.
pros: This press makes two "pocket sandwiches" at once, which could serve two or four people
Healthy and easy to clean thanks to nonstick plates
cons: Some people complain that it's too small to accommodate thicker sandwiches

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay for 3 months and now trash.
customer_reviews.text: Update: one side on the griddle stopped heating at all. This occurred after three months and perhaps only 10 uses. Since there seems to be no warranty, I guess this griddle is trash. I would not recommend to anyone. Initial report: Functions fairly well. It doesn’t seem to get as hot as a normal grill. The brand label on the side was curling up when it arrived. I pushed it back down but stayed only for a day. With the grill set in the highest level, it still takes a lot of time to even cook pancakes. It’s best feature is that it folds up, so it takes less room to store than a regular griddle. Okay for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Turner

customer_reviews.title: Would not want to live without
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine, if you eat a lot of sandwiches or quesadillas, this will be great for you. I clean mine with a damp paper towel and it is nonstick. It takes about 5 mins to cook, a lot faster then a skillet and you don't have to flip anything, I love that. Use thick bread because it does press down and regular sandwich break will get crushed. I have been looking and have purchased many of these type of machines, this is by far the best, would not hesitate to order it again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These things are absolutely necessary for any sandwich afficionado
customer_reviews.text: Bought it with the intent on making live resin, and realized quickly that all I'd ever be doing with it is making bomb sandwiches.. Temp control is a rating point on here, which is silly because there is none. One setting only, HOT. I'm sure if you're the electrical type you could install some variable switch on it, but who needs all that to make a Cuban or a Reuben? Just plug the son of a gun in and oil er up!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandr Strovanovich

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Delivers great Cubanos!
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, but more importantly, my husband LOVES it for making his Cubanos! I will buy good products especially if my husband of 47 years cooks on it! You could use it for a mirror if you needed. I love the flat cooking surface instead of grill mark surfaces. Big cooking surface, easy to clean! Great quality, you won't regret buying this one! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Results
customer_reviews.text: Worst waffle iron I have ever used! I am 77 years old and have made many waffles in my time and this is by far the worst. It doesn't get hot enough and the waffles were a sad cream color with a mushy middle. The grill does not grill sandwiches well either.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: STAY AWAY! BUYER BEWARE! NOT GOOD!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the WORST! It is so slow to cook, even on the highest setting. We are talking 15 minutes to cook waffles. It's flimsily constructed, doesn't cook evenly, and just in general is undesirable. If it cooked a waffle decently, I'd love it. But it really just doesn't. I must have gotten a bum model or there are a lot of lying reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: IMUSA Large Electric Panini Press
customer_reviews.text: We have no regrets only that we recommend you buying one for yourself or for family or entertaining with others. We love have toasted bread, it's a win win you're definitely going to love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate wiring
customer_reviews.text: I've had two of these. They both work brilliantly for about 20 uses, then the inside wiring starts to go bad from heat erosion. You'd think they'd put adequate wiring inside, like the kind I find for 25 cents per foot at home depot.. I've had to rewire both of them. Then they work very well until the teflon wears off. Not going to purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Panini Press
customer_reviews.text: I use this Panini press very often to make sandwiches, quesadillas, melts, and wraps. It heats up very quickly and warms up the sandwiches evenly with the flat smooth surface griddle plates. I can't say the same for presses with ridges in the griddle. It is easy to clean up because the nonstick Teflon is of very good quality. You can wipe it clean with a damp paper towel, nothing ever sticks to the Teflon. I have had this press for a couple of years now, it is still good as new.
customer_reviews.author: E.A.

customer_reviews.title: Exaclty what i was looking for!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these before and i was in love with it, but for some reason it stopped working after like a year, i bought it from a store and it went out of business so i couldn't do nothing with the warranty, after that i try to find another electric panini press but i couldn't find one anywhere so i came to amazon and voila! fount it!... i'm very satisfied with my press.
customer_reviews.author: Andrés Blanco

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: We used to have this same panini press but it broke and we looked for it everywhere and could not find it. We found it here on amazon for less than what we had originally paid for the first one and it’s the same great quality. It’s super easy to clean and heats up super fast. We use it everyday and our last one lasted about 4 years or more.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Beware of hinges
customer_reviews.text: I used this press a total of el ten times, and the hinges fell apart. I'm unable to screw the hinges back together, and we'll have to send this unit to the landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wilson

customer_reviews.title: If you like toasty sandwiches and subs this is THE press to buy.
customer_reviews.text: This sandwich press is the bees knees. I use it constantly. Easy to use and easy to clean. Nothing sticks to the plates. Nothing. Even cheese wipes right off with a dry paper towel. I use it to make quesadillas as well as sandwiches. I'm a little confused by other reviews for this product. It's a SANDWICH PRESS. NOT A GRIDDLE. Don't buy this product with the intention of making PANCAKES with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this panini maker. It has become a regular part of my lunch/dinner making. I can make a quick panini during my lunch break. It heats up while I am cutting up my veggies. I throw some chicken & veggies in a tortilla wrap, and it cooks in 5 minutes, tops. I don't put any condiments on it -- just meat & veggies -- it is delicious and fairly low in calories. I love it. Plus, the cleanup is a breeze -- swipe/swipe and done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it for so many things and it always cooks it perfectly and is really easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I honestly do not know how I lived my life before without this kitchen tool! I use it for so many things and it always cooks it perfectly and is really easy to clean. I chose this one because the flat surfaces are so much more useful than the normal grooved panini press. Makes the quickest, most perfectly crispy bacon.. eggs... pancakes.. quesadillas, and of course, pressed sandwiches. Been using it for months frequently and no problems at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandwich Press
customer_reviews.text: I opened a small sandwich shop and purchased this as a inexpensive "starter" press for my shop! As of now it has pressed well over 2000 sandwiches and it is still performing as it did the first day out of the box. For household use this would probably be the last press you would ever have to buy. Great Buy!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: cbc

customer_reviews.title: Good size, big enough
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, the first one stopped working. I bought it because of the size.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sandwich Grill and Quesadilla Maker
customer_reviews.text: We use this a lot. Cleanup is very easy - just wipe with paper towel and then damp cloth. Heats sandwiches very quickly and gives a nice crusty grilled effect. No 'grill marks' but works better than those ones with the 'fins' as the entire heated surface is acting on your sandwich. We use tortillas and make quesadillas. Sometimes for breakfast I scramble eggs til they are almost done, but still slightly wet. Then put a flour tortilla on the grill, put the scrambled eggs on top with some grated cheese and cooked bacon and then another flour tortilla and then grill for a minute or two. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Healthy meals in just minutes!
customer_reviews.text: This panini press has a non-stick surface which makes for super easy clean up. It heats up super fast, in about 2 minutes. It cooks a sandwich or quesadilla in about 2 minutes, easy peasy. You can even create gorgeous evenly browned foods without using butter or oil making healthy pressed sandwiches super simple! We couldn't be happier with this press and have been using it to make quick, healthy paninis 4-5 times a week. It is a real time saver!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Banda

customer_reviews.title: Loved it deeply until it stop working :(
customer_reviews.text: Hey! So I purchased this at the end of 2018. I LOVED it. This panini press was crazy good, it covered everything of the sandwiches, heated wonderfully and evenly, and we loved it deeply. Nevertheless, one year later at the beginning of this year, it stopped working. One of the sides stopped heating suddenly, and 2 months later the other side. Now is useless, and we are terribly sad. It only lasted us 1 year. But it was so so good while in existence!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine M.

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, size and functionality.
customer_reviews.text: I love my grill press. I press various kinds of sandwiches including my favorite cuban sandwiches. Very quick to use, easy and cleans up really nice. Not heavy and big enough for two sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Shirl

customer_reviews.title: An Instant Hit!
customer_reviews.text: An instant hit in our home! From grilled cheese sammies, to paninis....every time we use this baby, we get rave reviews from our guests. The large surface easily handles our oversized home-made breads. Can't tell you how many times people said "I have one"...and told us how much they loved them...and followed that up with "...what an incredible pain in the (rear) they were to clean". As is correctly indicated by the reviews...the flat surface makes clean-up a breeze. LOVE this thing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Art Marko

customer_reviews.title: Worth it! 😀
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Our cuban bread and sandwiches come out delicious, plus this a very high quality product. Worth the cost! PS: for those reviews saying terrible for waffles...this is NOT for that... I stand behind this product for what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything they said...
customer_reviews.text: Read and researched well before buying this panini maker. I didn't want to spend more than say $60 and this had such good reviews so ordered it. Its a great size. I can fit a whole french or cuban bread stick in to it, cut up of course, which means I can do sandwiches for the whole family in one go. Non-stick really is non-stick. Even spillages come off easily and are wiped clean when cool. Its a great size, gets hot and makes great sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Abroad

customer_reviews.title: works really good
customer_reviews.text: the sandwiche press works really well and cooks evenly. The only thing is it doesn't have a on/off switch so you have to keep plugging it in when you want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product !!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for everyday use. It does not have temprature control knob like most others but that does not affect the functionality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Maria J

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last that long
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time and it was working just fine. We used it every day to toast bread and make panini-type sandwiches, which came out great. Also I loved the size because you could fir a big quesadilla in there. Somehow it stopped working about 10 months later. It just stopped turning on. So yeah, it should be upgraded to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: vaviless

customer_reviews.title: You don't have to use butter to get a nice crunchy crust
customer_reviews.text: Big enough to hold 6 sandwiches on regular slices of bread. You don't have to use butter to get a nice crunchy crust. It is heavy, so when you use whimpy bread, it will smash it flat!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Making Cubanos Fidel would be proud of!
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to review this little gem until I got a chance to "put it through its paces!" Now several sandwiches in, I can honestly say, Bravo! In my book, anything simpler is better. This very nicely made plancha is no exception! Get it out, unhook the latch, plug it in, cook your delicious Cubano sandwich while listening to the soundtrack from the movie "Chef", unplug it and wipe it down, done! Oh, yeah, enjoy your Cubano!
customer_reviews.author: AEK

customer_reviews.title: I love my beautiful Panini Press.
customer_reviews.text: I love how shining it looks. But be very careful because it gets super hot after using it.
customer_reviews.author: elsa dejesus

customer_reviews.title: easy using and cleaning
customer_reviews.text: We really like it a lot, but wish it had a light that indicates it is the right temperature and not go on and off.
customer_reviews.author: grandy is my name I  choose not to  change it.

customer_reviews.title: Best sandwich press
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic and durable sandwich press! Heats up fast, easily toasts/crisps and easy to clean up. Had the same model for over 10 years and so glad to have found it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Munoz Giron

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this press. Use it mainly for cuban bread and also quesadillas. Perfect for those things! Worth every penny! Update: after 8 months one of the griddle sides no longer heats up. Not good anymore with just one side heating up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This sandwich maker is the best of both worlds with its reversible plates. I'm not a fan of pseudo "grill" marks, but it is an option with this model. Toasting sandwiches is a real breeze with this appliance - quick, easy and clean - and the price is very affordable. Wish I had one during my college days. Also makes great quesadillas, which I don't suppose is something the ridged panini makers do very well. It could easily handle frying eggs or cooking crepes as well. In short, if you're in the market for a sandwich/panini maker, don't buy a trendy, expensive unitasker. Buy something like this instead.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Vanderhagen

customer_reviews.title: Great but wish it would lock closed!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product; the only thing I would have liked is for the sandwich press to be able to stay closed when not in use. It does have a lever to lock it closed, but it easily unlocks with any movement. It is inconvenient when transporting or storing it. Other than that, perfect for our family’s needs!
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy

customer_reviews.title: A sandwich press with class!
customer_reviews.text: I had this grill for over a year now and my opinion has not changed. It's well made with excellent quality. Not sure what I like about it the most; no groves, makes a perfect hot sandwich or that it is so easy to clean. I wish that Imusa would make a flat surface grill to cool burgers or steaks. Would try it on this one if it had a temperture control and a way to drain off the fat.
customer_reviews.author: V. Laney

customer_reviews.title: WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: THE ONLY WAY TO TURN IT OFF IS BY UNPLUGGING IT. Wow, what a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: keithkeith504

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT!!!!! I have a panini press but this is so much simpler and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Beers

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love making quick sandwiches on it. It's easy to use and they turn out perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nostalgia
customer_reviews.text: Brings me back to my childhood days sitting in my abuela's kitchen. This is a must have staple in every dominican, puerto rican, cuban, etc. kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Flete

customer_reviews.title: Makes Great Sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: Simple and terrific. Plates are removable and have gone through the dishwasher without damage, yet. The unit is somewhat flimsy being made of molded sheet metal but should last a few years as long as it's not abused. The grill I received had a misaligned top and bottom so I just "tweaked" it to make the two sides fit. Seems to have worked fine. For the price, the removable plates are what makes this a good buy in my book and if it lasts a few years I'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: IlPrimitivo

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE IT! The size is great and the freely adjustable top plate is very convenient for ensuring even contact with thick meats/bread. Compared this before buying with all of the options at my local sears, and this is STILL larger than the largest model in the store at $30 less. This, by the lid design, I can imagine is more versatile as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and doesn't get to hot. Great for grilled cheese sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Y.

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm grilled  sandwiches  🤤🤤🤤
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for thanking care of me when the first ordered failed. Still using this item regularly, exactly what I needed and ordered
customer_reviews.author: Rigoberto Pena

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pannini Press
customer_reviews.text: The press works well, sandwiches come out good. I with it had a knob to control the temperature, other than that I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I'm almost using it for every meal: pancakes, paninis, arepas uff everything even veggies!!
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Love this press!
customer_reviews.text: This press is big and heats pretty fast.. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I gotten this for my husband 3 years ago and he loves it! It amazing and work just fine! No issues or problem! Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Un

customer_reviews.title: Great for sandwiches.
customer_reviews.text: Like grilled cheese sandwiches or any type of hot sandwich then this is the item for you. Besides sandwiches is cooks just about anything you can think of. Great invention, perfect for two people. If you have more than two people in your family I would order the larger product. I would recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Esposito

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for ban ep
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a friend, but I have been using mine for over 3 years now. You are not suppose to wash it, but just wipe it clean while warm.
customer_reviews.author: thanh

customer_reviews.title: Great for making multiple paninis
customer_reviews.text: Great Panini maker! It is so nice to be able to make several paninis at once. Although it has a floating upper grill plate it doesn't work as well as hoped on thicker sandwiches. But I am still pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: love2ski

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy
customer_reviews.text: The machine heats up quickly and makes quesadillas in minutes. Everyone likes them so much, I've had to buy 2 more presses as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sprague

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My second purchase of the same item. Awesome product. The only improvement is that there should be a temperature adjustment button. However that is a small issue because overall it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Millie

customer_reviews.title: Broke after a handful of uses.
customer_reviews.text: Used maybe 5 times. It stopped working today. Just shut off and wouldn't turn back on. Pretty upset because it was expensive. I like flat presses.
customer_reviews.author: @panzafit

customer_reviews.title: Am loving the IMUSA
customer_reviews.text: Love our new IMUSA grill. I had previously bought a cuisinart, but hated the ridges..sandwiches were like toast and took a longer time to melt the inside..anyway saw this; I didn't know the brand but read reviews and took a chance. It is large (4 sandwiches), sturdy, heats fast and cooks even faster - keep your eye on it. But we are VERY happy with the results. If you want good old-fashioned grilled cheese, etc. sandwiches, this may be the one for you.
customer_reviews.author: Jalice

customer_reviews.title: Simple and great product
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, its works great. Plug it in and you are at full temp in under 2 minutes. The nonstick surface is better than expensive pans I have. I like that the top swivels. 2 large sandwiches fit easily. A large rolled up tortilla fits diagonally very well.
customer_reviews.author: Donavan

customer_reviews.title: I hate it.
customer_reviews.text: After 3 days, I hate it..It smells up the whole kitchen with a metallic smell. I'm unsure if this will go away after more use but it's AWEFUL! Makes my food taste like it as well. Not pleased thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ely

customer_reviews.title: This is the best item I have purchased in a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is the best item I have purchased in a long time! I have told everybody about this griddle. We use it a couple of times a week minimum. Plug it in, assemble your sandwich, put on the griddle for a few minutes (depends on sandwich thickness), perfect sandwich every time. Wipe clean and you are done. People will probably be getting this for Christmas this year, a lot of people.
customer_reviews.author: shawn robbins

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My father in law recommended this and I decided to buy it. Now I used this almost everyday. It is great.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: Mine worked for a day. The red and green lights never turned on. The clip broke the second I opened it. Made sandwiches one day and pancakes the next morning, let’s say the pancakes didn’t heat up! Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great item... Fabulous sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: Love this sandwich maker. I unplug it routinely when making several sandwiches, so it doesn't overheat. Cleans nicely... Love that the heating surfaces are super flat and move to a parallel position when cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Project Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long.....
customer_reviews.text: Died after 5 months of use so it went in the garbage. I decided to purchase another brand. The surface does peel after many uses and but on the positive it has a very large cooking area for wraps or sandwiches. Just be prepared if you use this often it will probably not last long,
customer_reviews.author: jhoopster17

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to clean and store and the large size is ...
customer_reviews.text: I make sandwiches and quesadillas in this almost weekly. When if ever quits, I'm getting another one. It is easy to clean and store and the large size is perfect for what we need it for. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: not so good
customer_reviews.text: the idea is great! But the top plate is heavy and smooches the bread. although I just use sandwich bread, maybe it would work with larger/stronger bread?!!?!? idk. also mine doesn't stay open.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: sucks, couldn't even heat up a cheeseburger without tearing up the bun.
customer_reviews.author: tommyknocker

customer_reviews.title: i bought one on April 23 and now it is ...
customer_reviews.text: i bought one on April 23 and now it is broken... i had to buy another one on October 28/16, i hoped it will last more than 5 months. .... I keep buying this because I love it, but it does not last more than 6 months. After 4, 5, 5 months stop working. It Is April/17 and it is already broken, it just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: DLR

customer_reviews.title: It worked fine until today - a little under five months
customer_reviews.text: It was used several times a week, plugging in for only the time it took to prepare one sandwich. It worked fine until today - a little under five months. My advise: do not buy this sandwich maker. it is really no good. I wasted my money, save yours!
customer_reviews.author: E. Vega

customer_reviews.title: flattens breads nicely without burning
customer_reviews.text: flattens breads nicely without burning, I just find it odd that there is no on/off switch, you have to unplug it to turn it off, and it's pretty big takes up a lot of counter space so I store it on top of my fridge when not in use because I don't use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Well, this press only lasted 6 months.. ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, this press only lasted 6 months.....and the warranty is 3 months. The screws that hold the top heating element to the handle loosened. They could not be tightened because the threads stripped out, probably due to the low quality of the aluminum used. Bear in mind that this was mostly from weekend use, if you use it daily it may not last the warranty period. Which would be alright I guess, since the company will replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Panini Press
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! We use this when we are short on time to make a great sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: The two plates make it easy to evenly grill sandwiches
customer_reviews.text: The two plates make it easy to evenly grill sandwiches. I love the flat plates as opposed to the lined-grill plates. I wish the plates were removable, would have made cleaning a whole lot easier. There is also no on off button, so you have to unplug it when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Its not the best
customer_reviews.text: Definitely could have found a better panini press, should probably try finding a more high tech one.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Connell

customer_reviews.title: Best appliance since the toaster
customer_reviews.text: I use this appliance just as much as my toaster and air fryer. Love them all.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Great grill.
customer_reviews.text: Toasts grilled cheese and other sandwiches with finesse. The smooth surfaces make it easy to clean although I miss the pattern of the ridged grills on the sandwich.
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: IMUSA, GAU-80102, Electric Panini and Sandwich Maker
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this item. It's quick, can easily make up to 4 sandwiches at the same time, and it's a snap to clean!
customer_reviews.author: BabyMomma

customer_reviews.title: Really nice product, nice details
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product, nice details, fast heat and equal all around the grill but the only Thing is, the grill doesn't have an ON/OFF button, so, you must plug it when you need it and unplugging when you done, beside that, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard G.

customer_reviews.title: Fast cooking & Faster clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Best kitchen purchase in a LONG time!!!! Takes minutes to heat up and cook! Perfect for grilled cheese for the kiddos! Super easy cleanup with a paper towel! W I do definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grilled cheeses again!
customer_reviews.text: Plug it in, wait 3 minutes, put in food and voila! Toasted sandwich. Looks great, simple to work, sandwiches are yummy. Construction feels like it will last a long time. Very good deal for price.
customer_reviews.author: B. Egan

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I AM MORE THAN PLEASED WITH MY PURCHASE. IT WORKS WONDERFULLY, IS EASY TO CLEAN (HAS NO GRID RIBS), LOOKS REALLY NICE ON MY KITCHEN COUNTER, AND THE PLAIN OLD SANDWICH HAS BEEN TAKEN TO A GOURMET LEVEL. IT IS A WONDER HOW GOOEY MELTED CHEESE, TOMATO AND FRESH HERBS BLEND SO WELL TOGETHER !!! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: This thing does not work good at all
customer_reviews.text: This thing does not work good at all. It will barley do a grilled cheese in 7 mins. Needs some serious improvements
customer_reviews.author: Pieter Rumburg

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Very easy to use and clean! Can’t live with out it! Takes sandwiches to another level!
customer_reviews.author: Deidra Alicea

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I dislike that there’s no temperature control and I have to unplug it to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Would be better if it had a tab to hold the lid open
customer_reviews.text: Works well but doesn't have a feature to hold the lid open (eg. when you want to melt cheese but not press down on it). Not too hard to use a mug or something to hold the lid open so not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and compact to fit on top of our microwave when not in use. Easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Mallo

customer_reviews.title: Does what kitchen gadgets should do, make life easier.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift but only recently used. We made patty melts using texas toast garlic bread. This made things soo much faster and easier. Oh, and the patty melts were awesome.
customer_reviews.author: coopercrew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for home use
customer_reviews.text: So far we've made a variety of sandwiches and stuffed French toast. Everything has been cooked to perfection; the device seems to intuitively know when everything is done. I've learned not to doubt it. It's a heavy, sturdy appliance, and we are very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing heavy duty little grille
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Heavy duty little sandwich maker that can be also used to cook hot dogs, eggs, quesadillas, yo name it.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Arasa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, family loves it and uses it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! It makes evenly toasted sandwiches inside and ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it a few times a week. Excellent quality! It makes evenly toasted sandwiches inside and out. Clean up is easy and folds up for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Panossian

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product! It does all it claims and we are really enjoying grilled sandwiches.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Waterford

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The only thing that would make this better is if I could control the height when closing so it didn't smush my sandwiches. But overall great buy, 2 years later and it's still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Sandrilla

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I can make any grilled sandwiches, French toast, quesadillas. Super easy to use. I wish it had an on/off switch instead of having to plug in/unplug.
customer_reviews.author: Tara Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great sandwich press!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for Cuban sandwiches! I bought this as a gift and the receiver loves it. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: ... make quesadillas in this thing mostly and it works great. I had always microwaved my quesadillas before and ...
customer_reviews.text: I make quesadillas in this thing mostly and it works great. I had always microwaved my quesadillas before and this thing makes them 5x tastier. I haven't actually made a panini in it yet...
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Danger

customer_reviews.title: Imusa Panini Press
customer_reviews.text: Bought this two years ago and use it all the time. In fact, I bought two more versions for friends of mine. My only complaint with this model is that it isn't hinged. The top plate is heavy, so if you don't want something squished, you have to fashion some sort of shim under the outer handle---so that the upper plate merely touches the top of the bread, rather than presses it. (and yes, I know this is a sandwich press---but some other models have a hinge). Despite the nitpick, I'm still giving this 5 stars. It makes my life so much easier when the family asks, "what's for dinner?".
customer_reviews.author: Easymonet

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it...
customer_reviews.text: Fathers day gift. He loves it. Easy to use, clean, stores upright if you want . It is fun seeing his face when he is using his new gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Click on "buy now". It will not dissapoint
customer_reviews.text: My mom has it still and she bought it like 6 or 8 ago. When I moved out I seemed to need it since I used it for many things. Bought it and love it. Best "toaster" ever
customer_reviews.author: JACC015

customer_reviews.title: I love this panini maker!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! I love that it has flat plates and no ridges!!
customer_reviews.author: ALP43

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Nice kitchen addition for those great sandwiches. It delivers but be careful it gets hot to touch. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ram

customer_reviews.title: Great hot subs but don't forget to unplug.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second sandwich maker. It's size and swivel top are great but the only drawback and that's why a bought a replacement, is that it doesn't shut off automatically, say after 20 minutes. I left it unattended for so long that the heating elements burnt out. If that feature could be added to the appliance it would really be worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
